mapper.select: SELECT viewtime, point, adno,num FROM (SELECT viewtime, point, adno,rownum as num FROM (SELECT viewtime, point, adno FROM adviewlist WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY viewtime DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT adsubject FROM ad WHERE adno=#{adno}
SELECT reply FROM reply WHERE bno=#{adno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adviewlist WHERE id=#{id}
